Text: Re PictureWhy in the world would I want a picture of you at one of your gay bars So did you crop out your backdoor man Really quit trying to hit on me Im not bi Or is that a picture of you at the new Vail condo If its at the Vail condo then its ok that youre gay So whats up with you I see the ski trip is starting to take form You know we have to go meet the All Girl Ski team So are you getting ready for them Damn they about killed me last time Those steep tight tree trails And then the last run of the day the ski run from hell I was just thinking Have you ever been to my place reminder to Pual Donnie is not gay One of these days if youre in town maybe a group of us could go out to eat or something Later Heavy D Original Message From Lucci Paul T Sent Wednesday November PM To Bob Williams Email Brian Veazey Email Cameron Cryans Email don bratcher Email Joey Brewer Email john dwilliamson Email Larry Bevans Email Michael Subject FW Picture Here is a picture of me you should all save it and have me sign it next time we get together
